title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.6 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.6 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records shall be produced between the hours of 8:30 a.m. and 5 p.m. on all days
when such locations are regularly open for business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-2.6

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
